channel.title: Server hosting idea, need help
channel.description:
Ive got an idea to host my server of my css server which i brought from a company, how will i connect my run.bat to my server?
So say, the ip to my server was
96.67.112.90
How would i connect my run.bat to that? Or, isn't it possible?
